name: Donut Dush
description:
You have seen that donut is just a food. You can not play in the reality, but now.. You can choose the donut that want you to play. With the more variants and great taste. Try now!

Find them and meet the COOKIE COOKY, P-MUSHROOM, etc.

GAMEPLAY:

1.Slide to the right and left to play
2.Select a donut that you most like
3.Get pizza, spaghetti, burgers, and more
